title: 新手進入我伺服器，不能次次去到新手地圖
author: lanceryy
txt_content:
問題: 新手進入我伺服器，有時會去到newcomer 世界 有時會去到新世界正式
 地圖BlazelandII，我希望新每第1次進入伺服器會自然去newcomer ，而非到正式世界.

我有兩張地圖. 
第1張: newcomer 新手地圖 (新手需要在此遊戲完成任務才能升級到新正式世界BlazelandII
 第1張: BlazelandII






以下是我一些設定可以有些....插件造成衝突.煩請幫我看看出了什麼問題.謝謝你們.

server.properties
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
#Minecraft server properties
#Fri Mar 08 21:41:10 HKT 2013
generator-settings=
allow-nether=false
level-name=BlazelandII
enable-query=false
allow-flight=false
server-port=25565
query.port=25565
level-type=DEFAULT
enable-rcon=false
level-seed=489480137389818742
server-ip=
max-build-height=256
spawn-npcs=true
white-list=false
debug=false
spawn-animals=true
snooper-enabled=true
hardcore=false
texture-pack=
online-mode=true
pvp=false
difficulty=3
server-name=Blazeland
gamemode=0
max-players=36
spawn-monsters=true
view-distance=6
generate-structures=true
spawn-protection=10
motd=Blazeland Server
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------


1. Authme
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
ForceSingleSession: true
ForceSpawnLocOnJoinEnabled: false
SaveQuitLocation: false
AllowRestrictedUser: false
AllowedRestrictedUser: []
kickNonRegistered: false
kickOnWrongPassword: false
teleportUnAuthedToSpawn: false
minNicknameLength: 3
allowMovement: true
timeout: 150
allowedNicknameCharacters: '[a-zA-Z0-9_?]*'
allowedMovementRadius: 150
enablePasswordVerifier: true
ProtectInventoryBeforeLogIn: true
displayOtherAccounts: true
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
2. GroupManager ( groups.yml )


newcome: 
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
groups:
default:
default: true
permissions:
- -bukkit.command.kill
- essentials.balance
- essentials.sell
- essentials.spawn
inheritance:
info:
prefix: '&7 ► Newbiew ◄ &7'
build: true
suffix: ''


BlazelandII:
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
fellowII:
default: true
permissions:
- flyp.fly.1
- -bukkit.command.kill
- essentials.sethome
- essentials.delhome
- essentials.home
- essentials.hat
- essentials.spawn
- essentials.save
- essentials.sethome.multiple
- essentials.balance
- essentials.balancetop
- coreprotect.inspect
- afk.auto
- helpop
- essentials.sell
- wa.use.mailbox
- wa.use.deposit.money
- wa.use.withdraw.money
- wa.announcer.receive
- wa.password.create
- wa.password.change
- wa.canbuy
- wa.cansell
- multiverse.portal.access.*
- head.spawn
- msg
inheritance:
- g:groupmanager_default
- g:bukkit_default
- g:essentials_default
- g:towny_default
info:
prefix: '&2 ► FellowII ◄ &e'
build: true
suffix: ''

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------





3. Multiverse-Core

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

multiverse-configuration:
==: com.onarandombox.MultiverseCore.MultiverseCoreConfiguration
enforceaccess: 'false'
prefixchat: 'true'
useasyncchat: 'true'
teleportintercept: 'true'
firstspawnoverride: 'true'
displaypermerrors: 'true'
globaldebug: '0'
silentstart: 'false'
messagecooldown: '5000'
version: '2.9'
firstspawnworld: newcomer
teleportcooldown: '1000'
defaultportalsearch: 'false'
portalsearchradius: '16'

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------




4.Essentials
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
###################################
# +----------------------------------------------------+ #
# | Essentials Spawn / New Players | #
# +----------------------------------------------------+ #
###################################

newbies:
# Should we announce to the server when someone logs in for the first time?
# If so, use this format, replacing {DISPLAYNAME} with the player name.
# If not, set to ''
#announce-format: ''
announce-format: '&dWELCOME {DISPLAYNAME}&d'

# When we spawn for the first time, which spawnpoint do we use?
# Set to "none" if you want to use the spawn point of the world.
spawnpoint: newbies

# Do we want to give users anything on first join? Set to '' to disable
# This kit will be given regardless of cost, and permissions.
#kit: ''
kit: tools

# Set this to lowest, if you want Multiverse to handle the respawning
# Set this to high, if you want EssentialsSpawn to handle the respawning
# Set this to highest, if you want to force EssentialsSpawn to handle the respawning
respawn-listener-priority: highest
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
